sys_ux_data_broker_transform.name: Process RFI
sys_ux_data_broker_transform.props: [ { "name": "parent", "label": "Parent Record", "description": "The parent record identifier", "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "userid", "label": "User ID", "description": "The ID of the user", "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "afterRFI", "label": "After RFI", "description": "Indicates if action is after RFI", "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": false, "defaultValue": false }, { "name": "rfiRecipient", "label": "RFI Recipient", "description": "The recipient of the RFI", "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "previousApprover", "label": "Previous Approver", "description": "The previous approver's ID", "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": false, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "comment", "label": "Comment", "description": "Additional comments", "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": false, "defaultValue": "" } ]
